name: Booncle
description:
Booncle is a competitive multiplayer twin stick shooter where your bullets bounce!

Choose from 8 different weapons, 6 sub weapons, and your color and battle your friends in a frantic and fast paced brawl.  

Engage in one of a kind gameplay

2-4 player local multiplayer

8 unique weapons that change the way you play

6 distinct subweapons that enhance how fight

Controls:

Move with left stick

aim with right stick

Right trigger is fire

Right bumper is secondary fire
